other_tests.findings: Edema, erythema, and minimal warmth in the right knee with mild tenderness to palpation.
Critically elevated lipase >3000 initially; later reported lipase 1837.
Oxygen saturation dropped to 90% on NRB mask and improved to 98% on Bipap.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Oxygen saturation improved from 90% to 98% after starting Bipap.

other_tests.findings: LLB haziness but no definite effusion or interstitial edema.
Bibasilar atelectatic changes persist; no acute focal pneumonia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Slightly better inspiration noted compared to the previous study.
